      • Methods inherited from interface de.ityx.contex.itag.ITagModelParameter

        addLabel, addNamespace, addTrainingDocument, addTrainingDocuments, fetchTrainingDocument, fetchTrainingDocuments, getLabels, getLastConfigurationChange, getModelPerformance, getModelStatus, listAllTrainingDocuments, listNamespaces, removeLabels, removeNamespace, removeTrainingDocument, removeTrainingDocuments, setTrainingDocuments, updateLabel, updateTrainingDocument, updateTrainingDocuments

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        void evaluate(String master,
            String namespace)
        Performs a cross-validation on the training corpus using the parameters determined by optimize() If optimize() was not run yet, default parameters will be used. The result of the cross-validation is output by logging.
        Parameters:
        master - identification of the training corpus to use.
        namespace - identification of the training corpus to use.

      • train

        ModelStatus train(String master,
                String namespace)
        Trains an ER classifier on the training corpus of the given master/namespace tuple without a feature selection. This is equivalent to train(master, namespace, false). This may be faster than train with optimize but maybe more accurate on new data.
        Parameters:
        master - identification of the training corpus and features to use
        namespace - identification of the training corpus and features to use
        Returns:
        the new status of the training corpus and model after this operation. (The result is identical to calling getModelStatus() immediately after this method)

      • train

        ModelStatus train(String master,
                String namespace,
                boolean optimize)
        Trains an ER classifier on the training corpus of the given master/namespace tuple. If the parameter optimize is true a feature selection is performed before the real training. This can take a very long time.
        Parameters:
        master - identification of the training corpus and features to use.
        namespace - identification of the training corpus and features to use.
        optimize - perform feature selection before training.
        Returns:
        the new status of the training corpus and model after this operation. (The result is identical to calling getModelStatus() immediately after this method)

      • exportConfiguration

        String exportConfiguration(String master)
        Export an ITag configuration denoted by master. Exported are the models and training corpora of all namespaces contained within the given master. This method may return a HUGE string of xml.
        Specified by:
        exportConfiguration in interface ITagModelParameter
        Parameters:
        master - The master the ITag was defined in.
        Returns:
        The configuration serialized as xml. Attention this string may be huge.

      • importConfiguration

        void importConfiguration(String master,
                       String xmlConfiguration,
                       boolean deleteExistingData)
        Import an ITag configuration and associate ith with the given master. If deleteExistingData is true, ALL namespaces that are present in the master are deleted before import. If deleteExistingData is false, the new namespaces from the import will be added to the existing content of the master. In this case, no namespace with the same name as one that should be imported must be present, otherwise an IllegalArgumentException is thrown and the import is rolled back.
        Specified by:
        importConfiguration in interface ITagModelParameter
        Parameters:
        master - the master the ITag should be added to.
        xmlConfiguration - the ITag configuration to import. This is a string containing XML as returned by exportConfiguration(String).
        deleteExistingData - Remove all existing namespaces of the given master before import.
